sources.title: A Scout with the Gout (1947)
sources.description: Lulu's father, wishing to relive his days as a boyscout and to help Lulu get into the girlscouts, takes his daughter on a camping trip.What follows is hysterical. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-scout-with-the-gout-1947/

metadata.Plot: Compared to his daughter, Little Lulu's father learns that wild animals are tame creatures when he takes her on a camping trip. He comes home a defeated and worn-out man, while Lulu is just getting warmed up.
metadata.Actors: Izzy Sparber, Arnold Stang, Jackson Beck
